content.prompt: Arguments such as that in the excerpt contributed most directly to which of the following in the nineteenth century?

choices.label: The extension of equal civil rights to African Americans in northern states
A growing sectional divide about slavery and its expansion
The migration of African Americans from the rural South to the urban North
The abolition of slavery in the southern states

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
